name: Anomaly Detection – Infra – Saturation – More Than Usual Memory Usage Detected on a Node

alertDefProperties.name: Anomaly Detection – Infra – Saturation – More Than Usual Memory Usage Detected on a Node
alertDefProperties.description: Coralogix’s anomaly detection automatically learns normal memory usage patterns for each node within a k8s cluster. When a node begins consuming more memory than usual for the same period and conditions (25%), the alert triggers to provide early warning of resource saturation or potential instability.
